attributes.additional_details:
What not to love about KCon? It's a fun event with a lot of people enjoying a piece of pop culture from one of the most interesting countries in the world; people connecting through the love towards their favourite Korean idols and having the chance to be themselves with other people with similar taste in music. 


https://www.change.org/p/kcon-in-london-uk-bring-kcon-to-london-uk 
People already start petitions on the internet.
http://www.billboard.com/articles/columns/k-town/6656778/kcon-los-angeles-new-york-attendance 
Kpop has an enormous fanbase. 


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fm9JXO3IuCg <- watch some kCon videos and decide for yourself.
attributes.background: As we all know KCon is the biggest K-pop event in America, a lot of fans would love it if it was possible to bring KCon to the UK.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for bringing KCon to the UK.
